trans-unit.source: Represents a complete, in-memory description of the service, including all the endpoints for the service and specifications for their respective addresses, bindings, contracts and behaviors.
trans-unit.target: 메모리에서 서비스에 대 한 모든 끝점 및 해당 주소, 바인딩, 계약 및 동작에 대 한 사양을 포함 하 여 서비스의 서비스 설명을 나타냅니다.

trans-unit.source: The information contained in the ServiceDescription is used by the [!INCLUDE[indigo1](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] system to building the run-time components for the service.
trans-unit.target: ServiceDescription에 포함 된 정보에서 사용 되는 [!INCLUDE[indigo1](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] 시스템 서비스에 대 한 런타임 구성 요소를 작업할을 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Use this method when adding custom behaviors to extend <xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceHost>.
trans-unit.target: 사용자 지정 동작을 추가할 경우 <xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceHost>.</xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceHost> 확장 하려면이 메서드를 사용

trans-unit.source: Programmatically, you must <xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.Collection%601.Add%28%600%29> the custom service behavior to the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceDescription.Behaviors%2A> prior to when you call the <xref:System.ServiceModel.ICommunicationObject.Open%2A> method on the <xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceHost> object.
trans-unit.target: 프로그래밍 방식으로 수행 해야 <xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.Collection%601.Add%28%600%29>사용자 지정 서비스 동작을는 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceDescription.Behaviors%2A>호출 하기 전에 <xref:System.ServiceModel.ICommunicationObject.Open%2A>에서 메서드는 <xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceHost>개체입니다.</xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceHost> </xref:System.ServiceModel.ICommunicationObject.Open%2A> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceDescription.Behaviors%2A> </xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.Collection%601.Add%28%600%29>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceDescription.GetService%28System.Object%29> and <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceDescription.GetService%28System.Type%29> methods are available to reflect on behaviors using the [!INCLUDE[indigo1](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] programming model when replacing <xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceHostBase> with you own hosting mechanism.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceDescription.GetService%28System.Object%29>및 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceDescription.GetService%28System.Type%29>메서드를 사용 하 여 동작에 반영 하기 위해 사용할 수는 [!INCLUDE[indigo1](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] 프로그래밍 모델을 바꿀 때 <xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceHostBase>사용자의 호스팅 메커니즘으로.</xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceHostBase> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceDescription.GetService%28System.Type%29> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceDescription.GetService%28System.Object%29>

trans-unit.source: Export metadata about a service endpoint by passing <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint> as a parameter to <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlExporter.ExportEndpoint%28System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint%29>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint> <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlExporter.ExportEndpoint%28System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint%29>.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlExporter.ExportEndpoint%28System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint%29> 에 대 한 매개 변수로</xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint> 전달 하 여 서비스 끝점에 대 한 메타 데이터 내보내기

trans-unit.source: After calling this method, or one of the other export methods provided by <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlExporter>, use the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlExporter.GeneratedWsdlDocuments%2A> property to return the collection of <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription> objects.
trans-unit.target: 이 메서드 또는 다른 중 하나를 호출한 후 내보내기에서 제공 하는 메서드 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlExporter>를 사용 하 여는 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlExporter.GeneratedWsdlDocuments%2A>속성의 컬렉션을 반환 하려면 <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription>개체.</xref:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlExporter.GeneratedWsdlDocuments%2A> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlExporter>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceDescription"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 새 인스턴스를 초기화는 <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceDescription"> </xref> 클래스입니다.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceDescription"></xref> class from a specified enumeration of service endpoints.
trans-unit.target: 새 인스턴스를 초기화는 <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceDescription"> </xref> 서비스 끝점의 지정된 된 열거형에서 클래스입니다.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%601> of type <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint> used to initialize the service description.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%601> 형식의 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint>서비스 설명을 초기화 하는 데 사용 합니다.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint>

trans-unit.source: endpoints is .
trans-unit.target: endpointsis .

trans-unit.source: Gets the behaviors associated with the service.
trans-unit.target: 서비스에 연결 된 동작을 가져옵니다.

trans-unit.source: Use this method when adding custom behaviors to extend <xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceHost>.
trans-unit.target: 사용자 지정 동작을 추가할 경우 <xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceHost>.</xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceHost> 확장 하려면이 메서드를 사용

trans-unit.source: Programmatically, you must <xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.Collection%601.Add%28%600%29> the custom service behavior to the Behaviors prior to when you call the <xref:System.ServiceModel.ICommunicationObject.Open%2A> method on the <xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceHost> object.
trans-unit.target: 프로그래밍 방식으로 수행 해야 <xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.Collection%601.Add%28%600%29>호출 하기 전에 동작을 사용자 지정 서비스 동작의 <xref:System.ServiceModel.ICommunicationObject.Open%2A>에서 메서드는 <xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceHost>개체.</xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceHost> </xref:System.ServiceModel.ICommunicationObject.Open%2A> </xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.Collection%601.Add%28%600%29>

trans-unit.source: The type of behavior that is accessible from the description hierarchy is scoped to the specific level.
trans-unit.target: 설명 계층에서 액세스할 수 있는 동작 유형에 특정 수준으로 범위가 지정 됩니다.

trans-unit.source: From the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceDescription> the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IServiceBehavior> is accessible.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceDescription>는 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IServiceBehavior>액세스할 수 있습니다.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IServiceBehavior> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceDescription>

trans-unit.source: If you want access to the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IEndpointBehavior> associated with an endpoint instead, you can obtain the endpoints for the service using the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceDescription.Endpoints%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 에 대 한 액세스 하려는 경우는 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IEndpointBehavior>대신 끝점과 연결 된 끝점을 사용 하 여 서비스를 가져올 수는 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceDescription.Endpoints%2A>속성.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceDescription.Endpoints%2A> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IEndpointBehavior>

trans-unit.source: Then retrieve the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint> from the collection with the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpointCollection.Find%2A> method that employs the relevant search criteria, and call the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint.Behaviors%2A> property to obtain the collection of the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IEndpointBehavior> objects.
trans-unit.target: 다음 검색는 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint>사용 하 여 컬렉션에서는 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpointCollection.Find%2A>호출 및 관련 검색 조건을 사용 하는 메서드는 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint.Behaviors%2A>속성의 컬렉션을는 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IEndpointBehavior>개체.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IEndpointBehavior> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint.Behaviors%2A> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpointCollection.Find%2A> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Collections.Generic.KeyedByTypeCollection%601> of type <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.IServiceBehavior"></xref> that contains the behaviors associated with the service.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Collections.Generic.KeyedByTypeCollection%601> 형식의 <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.IServiceBehavior"> </xref> 서비스에 연결 된 동작을 포함 하는 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the name of the <<xref uid="langword_csharp_service" name="service" href=""></xref>> configuration element.
trans-unit.target: 이름을 가져오거나 설정 합니다.는 < <xref uid="langword_csharp_service" name="service" href=""> </xref> > 구성 요소입니다.

trans-unit.source: This name is not coupled to our configuration model.
trans-unit.target: 이 이름은 구성 모델과 결합 되지 않으며 합니다.

trans-unit.source: This is used by service host base to wire up the service.
trans-unit.target: 서비스 호스트 기준에서 서비스를 연결에 사용 됩니다.

trans-unit.source: The configuration name is a required string attribute for the [\<service\>](../Topic/%3Cservice%3E.md) configuration element.
trans-unit.target: 구성 이름에 대 한 필수 문자열 특성은는 [ \< 서비스\>](../Topic/%3Cservice%3E.md) 구성 요소입니다.

trans-unit.source: The name of the [\<service\>](../Topic/%3Cservice%3E.md) configuration element used to configure the service.
trans-unit.target: 이름에서 [ \< 서비스\>](../Topic/%3Cservice%3E.md) 구성 요소 서비스를 구성 하는 데 사용 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets the collection of endpoints from the service description.
trans-unit.target: 서비스 설명에서 끝점의 컬렉션을 가져옵니다.

trans-unit.source: The endpoints in the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpointCollection> returned by this method each contain the address, binding, contract, and behavior information required to communicate with the service.
trans-unit.target: 끝점의 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpointCollection>서비스와 통신 하는 데 필요한 주소, 바인딩, 계약 및 동작 정보를 각각 포함이 메서드에서 반환 된.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpointCollection>

trans-unit.source: To access this information, you must retrieve the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint> from the collection with the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpointCollection.Find%2A> method that employs the relevant search criteria.
trans-unit.target: 이 정보에 액세스 하려면 검색 해야는 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint>사용 하 여 컬렉션에서는 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpointCollection.Find%2A>관련 검색 기준을 적용 하는 메서드입니다.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpointCollection.Find%2A> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint>

trans-unit.source: Then the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint> properties can be used to access the information.
trans-unit.target: 그런 다음 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint>속성을 사용 하 여 정보에 액세스할 수 있습니다.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint>

trans-unit.source: For example, the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ContractDescription> is accessed by the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint.Contract%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 예를 들어는 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ContractDescription>액세스는 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint.Contract%2A>속성.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint.Contract%2A> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ContractDescription>

trans-unit.source: Export metadata about a service endpoint by passing <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint> as a parameter to <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlExporter.ExportEndpoint%28System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint%29>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint> <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlExporter.ExportEndpoint%28System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint%29>.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlExporter.ExportEndpoint%28System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint%29> 에 대 한 매개 변수로</xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint> 전달 하 여 서비스 끝점에 대 한 메타 데이터 내보내기

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpointCollection"></xref> that contains the endpoints defined for the service.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpointCollection"> </xref> 서비스에 대해 정의 된 끝점을 포함 하 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Returns a service description initialized with a specified service object.
trans-unit.target: 지정한 서비스 개체를 사용 하 여 초기화 되는 서비스 설명을 반환 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Use this method to reflect on behaviors using the [!INCLUDE[indigo1](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] programming model when replacing <xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceHostBase> with you own hosting mechanism.
trans-unit.target: 사용 하 여 동작에 반영 하려면이 메서드를 사용 하 여는 [!INCLUDE[indigo1](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] 프로그래밍 모델을 바꿀 때 <xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceHostBase>사용자의 호스팅 메커니즘으로.</xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceHostBase>

trans-unit.source: GetService initializes the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceDescription.Name%2A>, <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceDescription.Namespace%2A>, and <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceDescription.ConfigurationName%2A> properties, and ensures that the <xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceBehaviorAttribute> is attached to the service and adds any relevant service behaviors to <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceDescription.Behaviors%2A>.
trans-unit.target: GetService를 초기화는 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceDescription.Name%2A>, <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceDescription.Namespace%2A>, 및 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceDescription.ConfigurationName%2A>속성를 보장 하는 <xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceBehaviorAttribute>서비스에 연결 되 고 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceDescription.Behaviors%2A>.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceDescription.Behaviors%2A> 관련 서비스 동작을 추가</xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceBehaviorAttribute> 하 고</xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceDescription.ConfigurationName%2A> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceDescription.Namespace%2A> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceDescription.Name%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Object> that implements the service.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Object>서비스를 구현 하.</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceDescription"></xref> for the service object provided.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceDescription"> </xref> 제공 되는 서비스 개체에 대 한 합니다.

trans-unit.source: serviceImplementation is .
trans-unit.target: serviceImplementationis .

trans-unit.source: Returns a service description initialized with a specified service type.
trans-unit.target: 지정 된 서비스 유형으로 초기화 되는 서비스 설명을 반환 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Use this method to reflect on behaviors using the [!INCLUDE[indigo1](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] programming model when replacing <xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceHostBase> with you own hosting mechanism.
trans-unit.target: 사용 하 여 동작에 반영 하려면이 메서드를 사용 하 여는 [!INCLUDE[indigo1](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] 프로그래밍 모델을 바꿀 때 <xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceHostBase>사용자의 호스팅 메커니즘으로.</xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceHostBase>

trans-unit.source: GetService initializes the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceDescription.Name%2A>, <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceDescription.Namespace%2A>, and <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceDescription.ConfigurationName%2A> properties, reflects on the type for any the <xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceBehaviorAttribute> objects and adds them to <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceDescription.Behaviors%2A>, and ensures that the <xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceBehaviorAttribute> is attached to the service.
trans-unit.target: GetService를 초기화는 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceDescription.Name%2A>, <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceDescription.Namespace%2A>, 및 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceDescription.ConfigurationName%2A>속성에 대 한 형식에 반영는 <xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceBehaviorAttribute>개체에 추가 합니다 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceDescription.Behaviors%2A>, 되는지를 확인는 <xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceBehaviorAttribute>서비스에 연결 합니다.</xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceBehaviorAttribute> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceDescription.Behaviors%2A> </xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceBehaviorAttribute> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceDescription.ConfigurationName%2A> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceDescription.Namespace%2A> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceDescription.Name%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Type> of the service.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Type>서비스.</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceDescription"></xref> for the service type provided.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceDescription"> </xref> 제공 된 서비스 유형에 대 한 합니다.

trans-unit.source: serviceType is .
trans-unit.target: serviceTypeis .

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the name of the service.
trans-unit.target: 서비스의 이름을 가져오거나 설정 합니다.

trans-unit.source: If the name is `null`, this property returns the name of the service type.
trans-unit.target: 이름이 `null`,이 속성은 서비스 유형의 이름을 반환 합니다.

trans-unit.source: If service type is also `null`, it returns the default service name.
trans-unit.target: 서비스 유형이 이기도 한 경우 `null`, 기본 서비스 이름을 반환 합니다.

trans-unit.source: When exporting WSDL metadata, the Name maps to the Web Service Development Language (WSDL) <`service`> element local name part of the (qualified) `name` attribute.
trans-unit.target: 이름에는 개발 언어 WSDL (Web Service) 매핑합니다 WSDL 메타 데이터를 내보낼 때 `service`> (정규화 된)의 요소 로컬 이름 부분 `name` 특성입니다.

trans-unit.source: The name of the service.
trans-unit.target: 서비스의 이름입니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the namespace for the service.
trans-unit.target: 서비스에 대 한 네임 스페이스를 가져오거나 설정 합니다.

trans-unit.source: When exporting WSDL metadata, the Namespacemaps to the Web Service Development Language (WSDL) <`service`> element namespace name part of the (qualified) `name` attribute.
trans-unit.target: 웹 서비스 개발 언어 (WSDL)를 Namespacemaps WSDL 메타 데이터를 내보낼 때 `service`> (정규화 된)의 요소 네임 스페이스 이름 부분 `name` 특성입니다.

trans-unit.source: The namespace for the service.
trans-unit.target: 서비스에 대 한 네임 스페이스입니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets the type of the service.
trans-unit.target: 서비스의 형식을 가져옵니다.

trans-unit.source: An instance of the <xref:System.Type> that implements the service.
trans-unit.target: 인스턴스는 <xref:System.Type>서비스를 구현 하.</xref:System.Type>
